TutoExplainContent: Welcome to the Stopwatch activity. Stopwatch is a simple stopwatch. It shows the user a number of digital stopwatches. Each stopwatch is independent
TutoAddContent: Press this icon to add a new Stopwatch
TutoCounterContent: Displays the current time of the Stopwatch
TutoStartStopContent: Press this icon to Start/Stop the Stopwatch
TutoResetContent: Press this icon to reset the Stopwatch
TutoMarkContent: Press this icon to add an intermediate time lap
TutoRemoveContent: Press this icon to remove this Stopwatch from list
TutoCsvButton: This button generates a CSV file that contains all the stopwatch marks with their corresponding counter number and time of marks in seconds.
